TopicTitle: Looking for someone to help with some models

Articles.Content:
Hi,

I'm maintaining a number of mods, one of them is Smart Parts.  I'd like to be able to create some new models, but don't know how, and don't have the time to learn.

I'm looking for someone who would be able to take an existing model and make some relatively minor changes and end up with a new model.

If interested, please contact me.

thanks

Linuxgurugamer
Thanks, I am working with one person already.
